price: 56. Nous lui[317] fîmes (pourtant) voir tous Nos Signes. Mais il les traita de mensonges et refusa d’y croire.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
